message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
I understand you're a serious buyer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $165. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I would like to counter with $150. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165, Bob. I've already met you halfway. If you're not willing to meet me at $165, I'm going to have to consider other options. What's your next move?
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still willing to pay $150 for the product. This is my final offer.
